co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.modules.computervision

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.modules.computervision.Histogram

  • public class Histogram
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has utility methods to process an image according to histogram based techniques.
    Author:
    cjortegon

      • obtainThreshold

        public double[][] obtainThreshold()
        Calculates statistics from the image in the 3 different channels (R,G,B)
        Returns:
        a matrix with the statistics from the 3 channels where the first row contains the mean values and the second row contains the standard deviation.

      • filterFigureByColorProfile

        public void filterFigureByColorProfile(double[] rgb,
                                       double[] range,
                                       double[] matchColor,
                                       double[] notMatchColor)
        Removes some colors from an image using a matching color profile.
        Parameters:
        rgb - The mean value to be evaluated.
        range - The sensibility from the real color and the mean value evaluated.
        matchColor - The color to replace all the matches. May be null and matches wont be replaced.
        notMatchColor - The color to replace the colors that didn't match. May be null and those out of the range wont be replaced.

      • filterFigureWithPolygon

        public void filterFigureWithPolygon(PolygonWrapper polygon,
                                    double[] insideColor,
                                    double[] outsideColor)
        Removes everything from the image that is outside from the given polygon.
        Parameters:
        polygon - Polygon to filter the image.
        insideColor - The replacing color inside the polygon. May be null and the inside region will be kept as original.
        outsideColor - The replacing color outside the polygon. May be null and the outside region will be kept as original.

      • filterFigureByGrayProfile

        public void filterFigureByGrayProfile(int gray,
                                      int range,
                                      double[] matchColor,
                                      double[] notMatchColor)
        Removes some colors from an image using a matching gray profile.
        Parameters:
        gray - The mean value to be evaluated.
        range - The sensibility from the real color and the mean value evaluated.
        matchColor - The color to replace all the matches. May be null and matches wont be replaced.
        notMatchColor - The color to replace the colors that didn't match. May be null and those out of the range wont be replaced.

      • smoothHistogram

        public void smoothHistogram()
        Removes the peaks from the histogram to make it more natural.

      • getStatisticalColors

        public java.util.Collection<ColorDistribution> getStatisticalColors(PolygonWrapper polygon)
        Calculates the statistics for all the present colors in the histogram.
        Parameters:
        polygon - region to filter the statistical analysis. May be null.
        Returns:
        a Collection of ColorDistribution containing the repetitions of each color.

        public double[] getRanges()
